name: .ADDON File Extension
summary: Learn about .ADDON files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An ADDON file is an add-on for Zaplots CFS Console, a console app used to install and run Zaplots software. It contains a feature that can be added to CFS Console. ADDON files are installed using .AOIS (Add-on Installer Settings) files.

content: Users who purchase Zaplots software use the company's CFS Console to install and run that software. Most notably, Zaplots publishes video games and backup software.

ADDON files allow users to add additional features to CFS Console. The add-on an ADDON file contains is installed using an AOIS file, which contains an installer script. Each ADDON file is linked to a specific AOIS file, used to install only that add-on.

instructions: You can install an ADDON file and use the features it contains in Zaplots CFS Console (Windows). To do so, you need a corresponding AOIS file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
